unit_rules.name: Warmaster of Chaos
unit_rules.text:
At the start of the Battle Round, select one of the following abilities to be active until the end of the Battle Round:
* Friendly +Heretic Astartes+ units (excluding +Damned+ units) within 6" can re-roll their Hit rolls
* Friendly +Heretic Astartes+ units (excluding +Damned+ units) within 6" have an Invulnerable Save trait of 4+
* Friendly +Heretic Astartes+ units (excluding +Damned+ units) within 6" can re-roll their Leadership and Battle-Shock tests.

unit_rules.name: Dark Destity
unit_rules.text: Each time this model's unit makes a Dark Pact and does not fail the resulting Leadership test, if the result of that Leadership test was 7+, gain 1 CP.
